title: (x) Hand written "snippets of life" - Augie {Dav}
content:
Any help in identifying this font would be greatly appreciated. I’ve hunted high and low to no avail and have been told the Typophile forums was the place to go for a definitive answer! Thank you for any help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=font.jpg) | 7.1 KB |
author: munkle

comments.content:
_Hmm.._ Well, Another handwriting script..  
_( You may want to refer to the [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001140/http:/typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq/#Q_15) concerning handwritten typefaces, first.? )_

_Edit.:_ That said, Its ‘ [Augie](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001140/http:/www.speakeasy.org/~ecf/alphabet.htm)’, from Emerald City Fontwerks.. :)

Wow, you’re good!

Sorry about it being a handwriting script, was just hoping that it might be a mildly popular one. Thank you again for your help :)
